
{{alias}}( value )
    Test if a value is a parseable JSON string.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        Value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    bool: boolean
        Boolean indicating whether value is a parseable JSON string.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = isJSON( '{"a":5}' )
    true
    > bool = isJSON( '{a":5}' )
    false

    See Also
    --------
